data.sentence: The word لَنَحْنُ comes from the root ن ح ن and is associated with the meanings: We

data.meanings: evenly, side by side, laid out, a rank/row/line, in order, with reference to a bird: extend its wings in a line, expand/spread its wings (i.e. not flapping).
data.sentence: The word الصَّافُّونَ comes from the root ص ف ف and is associated with the meanings: evenly, side by side, laid out, a rank/row/line, in order, with reference to a bird: extend its wings in a line, expand/spread its wings (i.e. not flapping).
